definition: a person born in the generation following the baby boom when the birth rate fell dramatically
details:
noun
- a person born in the generation following the baby boom when the birth rate fell dramatically
= synonyms: baby buster
- a person (or thing) that breaks up or overpowers something
= example: a person (or thing) that breaks up or overpowers something
- a person who breaks horses
= synonyms: bronco buster, broncobuster
- a robust child
- an informal form of address for a man
= synonyms: fellow, dude
